title: Disabled actors patronised by TV industry, says artist
description: Actors with disabilities are often cast to make non-disabled people look inclusive, an artist says.

title: Graham Potter: Chelsea boss says his family have received anonymous death threats
description: Chelsea boss Graham Potter says he and his family have received anonymous death threats following the club's poor run of form.

title: Eurovision 2023: Government pledges £10m towards Liverpool song contest
description: The money will go on operational costs like security and visas for the show, being held in Liverpool.

title: A million households can apply for £400 energy rebate
description: Almost a million households can now apply for winter energy payments, but it could still take weeks.

title: King had planned to meet EU chief

title: Ukraine war: Zelensky keen to meet Xi following China's peace plan
description: Ukraine's leader said the call for talks and a ceasefire showed Beijing was "preparing to take part".

description: Wigan recover in style from an opening-weekend loss in Super League, scoring 11 tries in a 60-0 home win against Wakefield.
